Description: Controls whether or not comment codes are enabled when entering comments.
Controls the name of the pull-down for comment codes.
Controls the name of the pull-down for custom comment codes.
Controls the name of the pull-down for secondary custom comment codes.
Controls whether or not Point based (single point in time) comments are enabled (note: If both Point Based Comments and Range Based Comments are disabled then all comments are disabled).
Controls whether or not Range based (start and end time) comments are enabled (note: If both Point Based Comments and Range Based Comments are disabled then all comments are disabled).
